Code For Selected Patterns
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 
{File:HYG_IS.txt  Index:57  Index Date:20180523  PL:75.00%  PS:25%  Trades:12  CL:2}

IF CLOSE OF 8 BARS AGO > CLOSE OF 9 BARS AGO
AND CLOSE OF 9 BARS AGO > CLOSE OF 1 BARS AGO
AND CLOSE OF 1 BARS AGO > CLOSE OF 2 DAYS AGO
AND CLOSE OF 2 BARS AGO > CLOSE OF 3 BARS AGO
AND CLOSE OF 3 BARS AGO > CLOSE OF 4 BARS AGO
THEN BUY NEXT BAR ON THE OPEN WITH
PROFIT TARGET AT ENTRY PRICE + 0.52146 %
AND STOP LOSS AT ENTRY PRICE - 0.706876 %
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
